PERSONALIZED SOLUTIONS

Flip the First Home You’ll Never See—We Make Remote Real Estate Simple!

Fast Track Improvements specializes in helping out-of-state investors flip properties with confidence. From start to finish, we handle it all—so you don’t have to be there.

150 Homes Flipped and Counting

Start Your First Flip Today

For Modern Life, Thoughtful Design Is Essential

We started Fast Track Improvements to take the stress out of remote property investing. With years of experience flipping homes for out-of-state clients, we know how to deliver quality results while keeping you in the loop every step of the way.

Your Renovation. Simplified.

With JobTread, you can track progress, approve budgets, and stay informed—without the hassle of managing it all yourself.

LEADING REAL ESTATE AGENT IN THE CITY

About Fast Track Improvements

Fast Track Improvements is dedicated to enhancing your home’s comfort, efficiency, and value through innovative energy solutions. With years of experience, we specialize in delivering tailored services that reduce energy costs while improving your quality of life. Trust us to transform your space with sustainable and effective solutions.

Testimonial

Client Feedback & Reviews

Fast Track Improvements exceeded my expectations! With their expert guidance, I purchased a home in Lincoln Park and completed a quick rehab. Now, thanks to their seamless process, my property is rented and cash flowing. Highly recommend their services for anyone looking to invest in real estate!

Neena Hayden

Working with Fast Track Improvements was a game-changer for me. They helped me find the perfect investment property and provided top-notch management services. I couldn't be happier with the results!

Joe Danko

As an out-of-state investor, I was hesitant to invest in the Detroit market. But Fast Track Improvements made the process easy and seamless. Their team of experts helped me find the right property and provided ongoing management services that have exceeded my expectations.

Patrick Henderson
Common Questions

Most Popular Questions

How do I know I can trust you with my property?

We’re licensed, insured, and have a track record of success. Plus, you’ll get real-time updates and photos of your project.

How long does a typical flip take?

Most projects are completed within 3-6 weeks.

What if I don’t know how to choose a property?

Our team has licensed realtors who specialize in identifying the best investment opportunities.

Send us a message

Reinforce the Offer

Don’t let distance stop you from achieving your real estate goals. Let’s flip your first property together!

Get Started Today
